img_text: nigger, which has been defined in modern times as extremely disparaging and offensive, really stems from the ancient Osiris Ka Ma'atian/TaMUURian words NGU (Negu, Negus), which stands for the King (Niger masculine) and NGA (Naga, Negash), which stands for Queen (Nigeria feminine). In the Ka Maatic/TaMUURian language, NGR meant GOD, As noted before, the personification of the deities/spirits/nature of KaMa at/TaMUURa are called the NETERU NTRU,NTYRU, Netjer, Netger, NGR, Niger, Nigger). As a matter of the Pharoahs were often called NGR or Enger or Niger or Nigger meaning The God
